about_the_game:
What a lovely surprise!

A mysterious package arrives at your door, but don't worry, it's your new best friend Ainsley!

Build them, calibrate them, talk to them, teach them to be just like you and one day they just might talk back!

But is it all as it seems?

Ainsley is part toy builder, part hacking puzzle, part questioning your sanity.

Encounter tricky puzzles in every step of building your new friend, wait... was that something out of the corner of your eye?

Collect information from the user manual, tutorial videos, objects around your room and messages with your friends to solve the puzzles. Someone or something seems to be working against you so you'll need all the help you can get!

What's in the demo?

The demo is roughly a half hour of the game where you take your first steps building and getting to know your new best friend!

name: Ainsley Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-760 (4 * 2800); AMD Athlon II X4 645 AM3 (4 * 3100)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060; AMD RX 580
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
